message.body: Hey Jennayyyy! Would you be free next Saturday to go to dinner for Sammy's birthday?
I won't be cause I'll be with mike in DC. Unfortunately.
But Sam said she might want to go to el vez.
Awww okay. I'm sure you'll have a great weekend with Seyer down there! Yea, that's where I'm going to make reservations.
They don't take reservations on Saturday.
And it looks like on Friday it's only 945. Aw man that sucks.
Man people are jumping on reservations so early!!! They said there are not reservations left on Saturday but we can walk in and they'll quote us a wait time. When are you planning to leave for DC?
Yup. I was off on Friday cause of Good Friday anyway so it worked out.
It did work out pretty perfectly! Awww I'm not going to have my steak-building tacos from a giant grill thing partner with me for Saturday!!!
Hahah just joking! Oh come on you're going to see your bespectacled significant other! He should come up one of these days and have dinner with us!!!
I know! He's just rarely here on the weekends cause of work. He usually come during the week. But yeah I'll see :)
